articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Kuwait
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Kuwait
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) - DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Jaber Al Mubarak Al Hamad Al Sabah upon his reappointment as prime minister of Kuwait.
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would further develop, the message wished him greater success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative to UN Sends Letter to UN Secretary General
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative to UN Sends Letter to UN Secretary General
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the DPRK to the UN sent a letter to the UN secretary general on Monday.
					 The letter said:
					
					 Last November 30 the UN Security Council once again adopted the "resolution" 2321(S/2016/999) misleadingly denouncing the self-defensive detonation test of nuclear warhead of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as a "threat to international peace and security".
					
					 The adoption of the "resolution" 2321 is merely another act of abuse of power and flagrant infringement upon the sovereignty entirely denying the exercise of the right to self-defense, the absolutely legitimate right of the DPRK, and therefore the DPRK rejects it categorically.
					
					 As already clarified, the detonation test of the nuclear warhead conducted last September by the DPRK is a part of the practical countermeasures in the face of the nuclear blackmails of the United States and the hostile forces against the DPRK, while demonstrating the firmest will of our service personnel and people to counterattack any type of adversaries in case of any provocation. 
					
					 The UNSC does not have any authority to question the nuclear test and ballistic rocket launches of the DPRK which were conducted to tackle the nuclear blackmails and the rackets of sanctions of the United States and nor is there any single article in the UN Charter or international laws which stipulate that nuclear tests and ballistic rocket launches constitute a threat to international peace and security.
					
					 Nevertheless, the UNSC, overpowered by the high-handedness, arbitrariness and coercive assertions of the United States, determined the self-defensive nuclear test and ballistic rocket launches of the DPRK as a "threat to international peace and security".
					
					 Therefore it can be concluded that the UNSC has gone beyond powers, lost impartiality which is vital for international organizations and committed an act of double standard, by behaving trickily with the application of the article 39, Chapter 7 of the UN Charter, which stipulates that the UNSC shall determine the existence of any threat to international peace and security before taking any action on sanctions. 
					
					 If the nuclear test and ballistic rocket launches of the DPRK were considered to be a "threat to international peace and security", then why the nuclear tests and ballistic missile launches conducted by the nuclear powers including the United States over thousands of times have not been questioned as "threats to international peace and security". 
					
					 In my previous letter to you, dated May 23, 2016, I clearly pointed out that there are too serious legal contradictions to be overlooked in the UNSC "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK and I kindly requested you to clarify the question. 
					
					 The fact that the UN Secretariat is not giving any response to the letter although over six months have passed since then, is a clear indication that the UNSC "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK are only illegal and illegitimate fabrications, strictly based on the interests and behind-the-scene maneuvering of the United States.
					
					 Regarding the question raised by the DPRK in my previous letter, I kindly urge the UN Secretariat to give an answer which is responsible and impartial, in such a manner that can convince the international community and in conformity with the mission of the UN for international peace and security.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Back Home from Cambodia
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Back Home from Cambodia
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK headed by Deputy Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, came back home on Tuesday after   attending the 9th Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly held in Cambodia. 
					 At the plenary session the head of the delegation referred to the achievements made by the Korean people in building a socialist power under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the principled stand of the DPRK government to protect peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 A resolution on establishing an efficient peace system to protect peace and security on the Korean peninsula was adopted at the session.
					
					 During the session, the delegation paid a courtesy call on the president of the Parliament of Cambodia and it had talks with the general secretary of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport led by Minister Kang Jong Gwan left here Tuesday to take part in the 3rd Asia-Pacific regional ministerial conference on transport to be held in Moscow.

articles.title: IFRC President Visits Sci-Tech Complex
articles.content:
IFRC President Visits Sci-Tech Complex
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Tadateru Konoe, president of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party visited the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 They bowed to the art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the complex.
					
					 Being briefed on the complex, they went round various places including the applied sci-tech hall, children's dream hall and e-library.

articles.title: Vietnamese Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Vietnamese Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Textile Mill
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Pham Viet Hung and his embassy officials Tuesday visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Vietnam.
					 Being briefed on the leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu associated with the mill at the room for education in the revolutionary history, they went round the rayon fabrics workshop and workers' hostel and other parts of the mill.
					
					 On the same day, they visited the National Gifts Exhibition House.

articles.title: Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in 8th UAWK Congress Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok and observed a moment's silence in memory of them.
					
					 At the old low-roofed thatched house in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They also went to the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong to place bunches of flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 They visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and made bows to the statue of Kim Il Sung waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets at the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid tribute to the victors of the great years and wen round various places of the museum.
					
					 They toured the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and the Sci-Tech Complex and the National House of Class Education.

articles.title: Women Footballers of DPRK Warmly Welcomed upon Return Home
articles.content:
Women Footballers of DPRK Warmly Welcomed upon Return Home
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The women football team of the DPRK came back home Tuesday after placing first in the 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
					 A great number of citizens in Pyongyang turned out in streets to welcome the women footballers.
					
					 The girls were greeted at Pyongyang International Airport by Ri Ryong Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials concerned.
					
					 Sportspersons and family members of the girls put fragrant garlands around the footballers and coaches' necks and presented bouquets of flowers to them.
					
					 The bus carrying the players left the airport for the city amid the welcome by residents of Sunan District.
					
					 They were warmly welcomed by Pyongyangites at Ryonghung Crossroads, the street of the Arch of Triumph, Changjon Crossroads, etc.
					
					 They visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before them and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Agricultural Sci-tech Exhibition and Presentation Opens
articles.content:
Agricultural Sci-tech Exhibition and Presentation Opens
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition and presentation of successes made in the agricultural science and technology this year was opened with due ceremony at the Academy of Agricultural Science Tuesday.
					 Present there were officials, scientists, researchers, technicians, teachers and postgraduate students from scientific and educational institutions and agricultural production units.
					
					 The exhibition and presentation is divided into six panels, including agricultural crop seeds cultivation, plant protection and stock-raising work.
					
					 Presented to it were more than 100 sci-tech achievements conducive to putting the agricultural production on a scientific and modern basis.
					
					 On display were more than 500 exhibits of 190-odd kinds, including new species of grain and various fertilizers and agricultural chemicals produced on the basis of Nano technology.
					
					 The exhibition and presentation will last until December 8.

articles.title: Performance of Wangjaesan Art Troupe Goes on in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Performance of Wangjaesan Art Troupe Goes on in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The performance of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe goes on in Pyongyang.
					 The East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, its venue, is drawing a full house every day.
					
					 The number of the performance include female solo and pangchang "Where Are You, Dear General?", female duet "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", tap dance "Young Days", light music "Higher and Faster" and folk dance "Drum Dance".
					
					 The performers well represented the feats of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who ushered in the era of Mallima (rapid progress) while translating the desires of the great leaders into reality and has wisely guided the entire party, the whole army and all the people to the final victory.

articles.title: Organic Liquid Additive Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Organic Liquid Additive Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- University of Sciences in the DPRK has succeeded in developing a highly efficient organic liquid fuel additive with locally available raw materials.
					 Experts say that it is rather easy to make the new additive and it needs less cost.
					
					 When the additive is mixed with fuel oil for locomotive and truck at the rate of 0.05-0.1 percent, it will save over 5.9 percent of gasoline and 7.1 percent of diesel.
					
					 It also prevents engine from corrosion and knocking, prolongs its serviceable life and remarkably reduces the emission of harmful gases.
					
					 Its production method was registered as one of national scientific and technological successes in August.

articles.title: Hana Musical Information Center in DPRK
articles.content:
Hana Musical Information Center in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Hana Musical Information Center in Thongil Street, Pyongyang is a comprehensive art information service center to promote the cultural and emotional life of people.
					 On December 15, Juche 100 (2011), the last year of his revolutionary career, leader Kim Jong Il visited the center. That day he said that the center should keep in store all art music information like recorded songs, sheets of music and books of music and dance published in the country. And he sent to the center all the music pieces he collected in his lifetime.
					
					 In an interview with KCNA, Om Ki Chon, deputy director of the center, said:
					
					 This year alone, the number of visitors to the center reaches over several thousands, including more than 1 300 overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 Visitors can get diverse service and share their views and experience.
					
					 On the second floor, there is the Hana Electronic Trading Company, one of electronic goods developers and producers in the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Develop the Revolutionary Traditions of Juche down through Generations".
					 The work, published on Dec. 5, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies the essence and importance of carrying forward the revolutionary traditions and the principles and tasks and ways for doing so.
					
					 The revolutionary traditions of Juche are the historic roots of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and their bloodline, and they serve as a banner for socialist Korea's eternal victory, the article says, adding;
					
					 The victorious advance of the Korean revolution which has greeted the period of a new leap forward in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche is a continuation of the dynamic march toward Mt. Paektu made under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean revolution was victoriously pioneered and has made a triumphant advance under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and always emerged victorious thanks to the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and the noble fighting spirit which fully embodied it.
					
					 The revolutionary traditions of Juche remain unchanged no matter how much water may flow under the bridge. They serve as the most precious treasure for the army and people of the DPRK who should make a long journey of the revolution.
					
					 Socialist Korea of Juche will dynamically advance toward the final victory thanks to the leadership of the great party carrying forward and developing the revolutionary traditions of Juche, the historic roots and eternal cornerstone of the Korean revolution, and to the heroic army and people fighting full of firm confidence and spirit of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: U.S. Aim at Organizing Naval Expeditionary Task Force Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Aim at Organizing Naval Expeditionary Task Force Disclosed
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Navy Institute announced a plan that the U.S. pacific fleet would make a trial operation of the naval expeditionary task force with Sasebo Port in Japan as the matrix port from the end of 2017. The plan envisages adding missile cruiser, nuclear-powered attack submarine, Aegis missile cruiser, missile destroyer and escort ship to the existing landing group centering on the large landing surprise attack ship with F-35 B stealth fighters aboard and three large-scale transport and landing ships with more than 2 200 marines.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this is a vivid expression of the dangerous moves of the U.S. warmongers to launch a war on the Korean peninsula at any cost. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has gone so absurd as to claim the organization of the task force is aimed to tackle the non-existent "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK, but it is sheer sophism.
					
					 The U.S. stages joint military exercises every year with the south Korean puppet forces, involving such huge armed forces as all types of nuclear attack means and special warfare forces for the purpose of getting them well versed in the mode of preemptive attack.
					
					 What matters is that the aim of organizing the task force is not just to bring dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. seeks "special interests" in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 It is going to hurl huge naval troops into the Pacific waters in a bid to turn them into their theatre.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region by pushing the situation there to a dangerous phase.
					
					 But it is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can realize its dirty ambition for aggression through the formation of the task force.
					
					 The U.S. had better be concerned about the security of its own mainland before having an eye on the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Reinvasion Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Reinvasion Denounced
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are trying to conclude even an "agreement on logistic support" with south Korea's Park Geun Hye group of traitors, not content with signing the "agreement on protection of military intelligence". 
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this clearly proves what dangerous extent the Japanese reactionaries have reached in their desperate bid to realize the ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 The "agreement on logistic support" specifies the types and items of military support which can be offered between the south Korean forces and the Japan "Self-defence Forces" in case of contingency, and it serves as a legal ground for hurling transport planes and other weapons of the SDF to the Korean peninsula in contingency, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean political situation is now in the grip of chaos and the U.S. master is busy shaping triangular military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea. Taking it as a golden opportunity, Japan has stretched its tentacles of reinvasion deep into the Korean peninsula.
					
					 All these moves of the Japanese reactionaries are dangerous acts of upsetting the strategic balance in the region and bringing dark clouds of a war of aggression.
					
					 The international community is strongly urging Japan not open the "Pandora's box". Japan should clearly understand this.
					
					 The way for reinvasion Japan is paving by instigating the Park Geun Hye group, already dead politically, will only lead it to ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Park Group's Country-selling Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Park Group's Country-selling Remarks
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the chief of the south Korean puppet Agency of Defense Affairs uttered that south Korea intends to comply with the demand of the new U.S. administration for increased upkeep of the U.S. forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this an action that could be taken only by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors, heinous pro-U.S. lackeys and poor colonial stooges keen to prolong their remaining days by kowtowing to their master. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that their preoccupation is to curry favor with the U.S. and then stay in power and persistently pursue the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, it points out, and says:
					
					 Finding themselves in such worst crisis that they do not know when they will be ousted, cursed and forsaken by the people owing to the extra-large scandal, the Park Geun Hye group are working hard to keep their treacherous regime under the backing of Trump by realizing his ambition to extort more money from south Korea under the pretext of "security umbrella" for it.
					
					 The Park group's above-said treason can never be pardoned.
					
					 As long as the group are allowed to stay in power, the south Korean people can neither escape disgrace and insult nor can the Korean nation be free from the danger of a nuclear war.

articles.title: S. Korean Foreign Minister's Anti-DPRK Rhetoric Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Foreign Minister's Anti-DPRK Rhetoric Blasted
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet Foreign Minister of south Korea, who traveled Australia days ago and talked nonsense that "provocation of the north" constitutes a direct threat even to Australia, not just south Korea. He even begged for support for settling "nuclear and human rights issues of the north".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary derides this as a cliche he used to make while traveling abroad together with traitor Park Geun Hye and her yes-men to elicit international "cooperation for stifling the DPRK", and rhetoric that reveals the nature of the sycophants and traitors who can subsist only by relying on outsiders. 
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 Yun, a waiting guy for Park Geun Hye, a Ri Wan Yong of modern version and the quisling who should be finished off along with Park, is still resorting to the sinister farce for "cooperation" abroad. This is a thrice-cursed act of treachery meant to fan up the atmosphere for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and stand up against the DPRK to the last. His despicable bid is just a desperate effort of a man more dead than alive.
					
					 The Park group of traitors have now gone desperate to prolong their remaining days in defiance of the people's strong demand for immediate resignation. But no matter what cunning sleight of hand they may employ, they can never escape the miserable end already sealed.
					
					 The broad segments of south Koreans who took to the streets holding candlelight will never pardon the group of traitors including Park and Yun.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails S. Korean Regime's Humiliating Diplomacy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails S. Korean Regime's Humiliating Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea persists in committing acts of treachery even at a time when it is on the verge of collapse after being forsaken by the south Korean people for inflicting all sorts of pain and misfortune upon them.
					 Recently, the chief of the Agency of Defense Affairs of south Korea said that he thinks south Korea has no option but to accept if the next U.S. administration urges it to bear bigger "share of defense expenses", only to draw public criticism. 
					
					 This is an act of treachery that can be committed by the Park regime only, a group of top-class lackeys and colonial servants which unhesitatingly leave the destiny of the country and the nation to the tender mercy of outsiders in a bid to stay in power and garner foreign support for unleashing a war against the north through humiliating "diplomacy toward the U.S." 
					
					 As well known, the puppet regime is covering 50 percent of the upkeep for the U.S. forces present in south Korea. This is reportedly the biggest payment of defense expenses in the world out of its GDP.
					
					 According to the "2017 report on U.S. forces" published by the U.S. Heritage Foundation, south Korea has offered "huge resources" amounting to about 900 million U.S. dollars every year to the U.S. as direct and indirect aid such as offer of land and manpower and exemption from various taxes, to say nothing of bearing the "share of upkeep" for the GIs in south Korea.
					
					 The puppet regime's offer of the funds collected as taxes from south Koreans to the U.S. is by no means unrelated to the scheme of the regime to stay in power though it has already been forsaken by the people for the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal."
					
					 The regime is working hard to make even an agreement on logistic support with Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, not content with the agreement on protection of military intelligence. It is busy flattering the U.S. by pressing ahead with the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 It was agreed at the 197th "joint meeting on SOFA" held in Seoul that the U.S. aggressor troops would as ever pay less electricity rate for the U.S. forces present in south Korea than that for ordinary local houses and institutions.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the puppet regime is going to send a "special delegation" composed of lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" to the U.S. to conduct bargaining with its new administration over such issues as the upkeep for the GIs in south Korea.
					
					 The treacherous rule of the puppet regime helps the U.S. even make money through usury with a huge amount of money it receives from south Korea, not content with perpetrating murder, violence, robbery and rape there.
					
					 The situation proves that greater privileges granted to GIs by the traitors, who deem their master-servant relations characterized by domination and subjugation and arbitrary practices their best "fortune," make the south Korean people suffer bitterer misfortune and agony. 
					
					 It is quite natural for the opposition parties and people of various circles in south Korea to term the regime "country-selling regime capitulating to America and providing to it funds collected as taxes." 
					
					 The humiliating behavior of the puppet regime will only result in strangling traitor Park.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Rejects "Orderly Resignation" Touted by Conservative Group
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Rejects "Orderly Resignation" Touted by Conservative Group
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Dec. 3 carried an editorial rejecting the theory of "orderly resignation" the conservative group drew up to prolong Park Geun Hye's presidency.
					 The editorial referred to a rumor being peddled to the effect that Park, much upset, agreed to accept the demand for "resignation in April" and attempted to publish another "talk to people".
					
					 It said that the people wonder why on earth they should wait till April, adding:
					
					 The people are preparing another candlelight action.
					
					 Their candlelight will burn away Park's crafty tricks and illusion of her political camp.
					
					 It will also demonstrate that any force can never survive if it is set to shape a policy overriding the people.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Resignation Urged Abroad
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Resignation Urged Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Overseas compatriots and south Korean students studying abroad staged actions in demand of Park Geun Hye's resignation on Dec. 3, according to south Korea's Yonhap News.
					 Korean residents in Manila held a rally demanding the ouster of traitor Park. 
					
					 Those in Washington held a rally demanding the resignation of Park Geun Hye and democracy.
					
					 In the meantime, Koreans in Los Angeles held a rally at which they demanded Park step down immediately and the "Saenuri Party" disband itself.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Dec. 1.
					 L. A. Kobuizov, first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The remembrance committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Italy and Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Italy and Brazil
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Italian and Brazilian personages made public statements on Nov. 26 and Dec. 1 to commemorate the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chief of the Italian Organization for Friendship and Support to the DPRK said they deeply remember Kim Jong Il with the approach of the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					
					 We came to keenly feel the advantages of socialist Korea while studying the works of Kim Jong Il who led the DPRK to prosperity, and are now widely disseminating his unique ideas and theories, the chief said, adding:
					
					 The world clearly witnesses socialist Korea advancing along the road of victory despite the imperialist forces' persistent obstructive moves and tightened economic sanctions and blockade.
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to happiness of the Korean people and performed undying feats for the cause of independence of mankind, and he will be always alive in our hearts.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, expressed deep respects to Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, saying that he is always alive in the hearts of them and other progressives of the world.

articles.title: Representante coreano envia carta al secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano envia carta al secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU envio el dia 5 al secretario general de la ONU una carta exigiendo la aclaracion del fundamento juridico de la "resolucion de sancion", fabricada hace poco por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando la prueba de explosion de la ojiva nuclear de la RPDC.
					La "resolucion de sancion" deviene un acto de abuso de autoridad y una flagrante violacion de la soberania que niega totalmente el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa, el legitimo y justo de la RPDC, asi condeno la misiva y prosiguio:
					
					Como ya hemos declarado, la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear, efectuada en septiembre pasado por la RPDC, es una contramedida real para hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles y una muestra de la voluntad superintransigente del ejercito y pueblo coreanos dispuestos a contraatacar a los enemigos si estos se atreven a atacar a la RPDC.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad no tiene ningun derecho a cuestionar la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de cohete balistico de la RPDC frente a la amenaza nuclear y sancion de EE.UU. Ni en la Carta de la ONU ni en los codigos internacionales se establece que la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de cohete balistico constituyen una amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales.
					
					Sin embargo, el Consejo de Seguridad definio la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de cohete balistico de la RPDC como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales", rendido ante el despotismo, arbitrariedades e insistencia absurda de EE.UU.
					
					Al desatender con disimulo la exigencia del articulo 39 del capitulo VII de la Carta de la ONU de que antes de tomar la medida de sancion, se decida "la existencia o no de la amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales", el Consejo de Seguridad cometio un acto de doble rasero faltando a la imparcialidad, principio vital de una organizacion internacional.
					
					?Si la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de cohete realizados por la RPDC fueran una "amenaza a la paz y la estabilidad internacionales", por que no la son las mismas cosas realizadas en miles de ocasiones por EE.UU. y otras potencias nucleares?
					
					En mi carta fechada 23 de mayo de 2016, solicite la explicacion transparente sobre la grave e insoslayable contradiccion juridica que hay en la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Aunque paso un semestre desde entonces, el Secretariado de la ONU no ha dado ninguna respuesta, hecho que hace conocer que la "resolucion de sancion" anticoreana no pasa de ser un documento ilegal, inventado por el control trasero de EE.UU. conforme a sus intereses.
					
					Exigimos reiteradamente al Secretariado de la ONU dar una respuesta responsable, imparcial y aceptable para la comunidad internacional sobre el problema planteado por la RPDC, de acuerdo con la mision principal de la ONU de garantizar la paz y seguridad internacionales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intento de EE.UU. de organizar la expedicion naval de golpe
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intento de EE.UU. de organizar la expedicion naval de golpe
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Instituto de las Fuerzas Navales de EE.UU. anuncio que desde finales de 2017 la Flota del Pacifico de EE.UU. manejara experimentalmente el grupo de expedicion naval de golpe tomando como puerto madre el de Sasebo de Japon. Segun este plan, la expedicion naval constara, ademas del colectivo de preparativos de desembarco que ya esta compuesto por los buques cargados con el avion de combate Stealth F-35B y los tres buques con mas de 2 mil 200 marinos, los cruceros de misil, los submarinos nucleares de ataque, los cruceros de misil Aegis, los destructores de misil, los barcos de escolta, etc. 
					En un comentario individual de este martes, Rodong Sinmun lo califica de expresion concentrada del intento de los belicistas norteamericanos de desatar a toda costa una nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, y continua:
					
					EE.UU. dice como si la organizacion de la expedicion naval fuera necesaria para prevenir la "amenaza nuclear y de misil del Norte de Corea", pero es una sofisteria ridicula.
					
					Cada ano, el imperio americano despliega a menudo con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios belicos conjuntos movilizando los medios de ataque nuclear de diferentes tipos y otras enormes fuerzas armadas adiestrando el modo de ataque sorpresivo. 
					
					Lo problematico es que su verdadera intencion no es desatar la guerra nuclear solo en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. presta "atencion especial" a la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Pretende infiltrar enormes fuerzas armadas navales en el Pacifico a fin de convertirlo en su teatro operacional. 
					
					EE.UU., es el autor de la agravacion de la tension que lleva a la fase peligrosa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Es inutil la ilusion de EE.UU. de lograr su sucia codicia de agresion mediante la fabricacion del grupo de expedicion naval de ataque. 
					
					Antes de abrigar la ambicion de apoderarse del territorio coreano, el imperio americano debe preocuparse por la seguridad de su propio territorio.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza ambicion de reagresion de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza ambicion de reagresion de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los reaccionarios japoneses firmaron el acuerdo de proteccion de informaciones militares instigando a la camarilla traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye. E insatisfechos con esto, se desesperan por concertar hasta el "convenio de apoyo militar".
					El hecho evidencia que llegan a la fase muy aventurera las tentativas de los reaccionarios japoneses para lograr la ambicion de reagresion.
					
					Revela asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes y prosigue:
					
					El "convenio de apoyo militar" determina las formas y generos de apoyo militar reciproco entre el ejercito titere surcoreano y las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon en el tiempo de emergencia y ofrece el motivo legal a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon para lanzar los aviones de transporte y otros armamentos en la Peninsula Coreana en el tiempo de emergencia. 
					
					En particular, aprovechando como una buena oportunidad la confusion politica del Sur de Corea y las maniobras de su amo norteamericano para fabricar la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea, el pais isla echa profundamente sus tentaculos de nueva agresion a la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El proceder de los reaccionarios japoneses destruye el equilibrio estrategico de la region y acarrea el nubarron de la guerra de agresion. 
					
					Ahora, la sociedad internacional exige a Japon que no abra la "caja de Pandora". 
					
					Japon debe tener presente que sus esfuerzos por emprender la nueva agresion instigando a la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, cadaver politico, le llevaran al arruinamiento final.

articles.title: ACNC comenta "diplomacia tributaria para EE.UU." de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta "diplomacia tributaria para EE.UU." de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La camarilla traidora de Park Geun-hye, que impuso sufrimientos y desgracias de toda indole a la poblacion surcoreana, no para sus actos vendepatrias hasta el ultimo momento de su vida politica.
					Hace poco, el titular de la Agencia de Asuntos de Defensa dijo que "piensa que el Sur de Corea se halla en la situacion de obligado a aceptar" el aumento de los gastos para el mantenimiento de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano si lo demanda la nueva administracion norteamericana. Este dicho produjo las denuncias de diferentes sectores de la sociedad surcoreana. 
					
					La horda de Park no vacila en sacrificar el destino del pais y la nacion para mantener su sucia vida restante mediante la "diplomacia tributaria para EE.UU." y mendigar la cooperacion para la guerra de agresion contra la connacional RPDC.
					
					Como ya conocido, los titeres surcoreanos cubren actualmente el 50% de los gastos para mantenimiento de tropas norteamericanas, o sea, la cifra mas alta del mundo si se toma en cuenta el PIB. 
					
					Segun el "informe de fuerzas militares de EE.UU. de 2017" publicado por la Fundacion Heritage de EE.UU., aparte de los "gastos para el mantenimiento", el Sur de Corea "ofrece una suma considerable" de casi 900 millones de dolares al ano por concepto de ayuda financiera directa o indirecta. 
					
					El intento de entregar a su amo gringo enormes impuestos recaudados al pueblo es otro remedio de la traidora Park Geun-hye para mantener su vida politica que se va apagando por el escandalo causado con Choe Sun Sil. 
					
					En el mismo contexto, ella suscribio el tratado de proteccion de informaciones militares con Japon, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana, y trata de pactar hasta el acuerdo de asistencia logistica, por una parte y por la otra, impulsa por la fuerza el despliegue de THAAD.
					
					En la 197a "reunion conjunta del convenio sobre la posicion de tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea", sesionada en Seul, fue rechazado el problema de alzar la tarifa de electricidad para esos uniformados y se acordo cobrarles en el proximo ano tambien el precio inferior al que paga una casa u organo normal del Sur de Corea.
					
					Ademas, los titeres surcoreanos intentan enviar el "grupo de enviados especiales de visita a EE.UU." integrado por los "parlamentarios" por el Partido Saenuri para negociar otra vez con la nueva administracion norteamericana el tema de gastos para el mantenimiento de tropas estadounidenses ocupantes del suelo surcoreano y otros asuntos. 
					
					Debido a la gobernacion vendepatria de ellos, las tropas ocupantes norteamericanas tienen impunidad aunque cometen crimenes de toda indole, tales como el asesinato, la violencia y la violacion sexual. 
					
					La realidad demuestra que se aumentan tambien la desgracia y el sufrimiento de los habitantes surcoreanos, a medida que  crecen el privilegio y prerrogativas que concede a EE.UU. la horda surcoreana que se cree "afortunada" de ser sirviente del imperio.
					
					Es muy natural que los partidos opositores y los habitantes de diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea denunciaran rotundamente el acto humillante de la camarilla de Park como "poder vendepatria", "rendicion con bandera blanca ante EE.UU." e "intencion de regalar a EE.UU. los impuestos pagados con sangre por el pueblo". 
					
					El aumento de "la cuota de defensa" para EE.UU. no dara otro resultado que estrangular hasta el final a la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye.
